name: geekcache/geekcache
description: A wrapper for Memcached with tags, soft invalidation, memoization, and regeneration through callbacks

suggest.illuminate/container: geekcache requires either the illuminate container or pimple 1.x if you wish to use the included service provider
suggest.pimple/pimple: geekcache requires either the illuminate container or pimple 1.x if you wish to use the included service provider
